answers.answer: Good luck! I found out I have low platelets, vitamin b12 deficiency and low iron. I have to start getting injections of b12 and then probably an iv of iron...so hopefully urs isnt too bad and the pills will help enough!
Aww I'm so sorry to hear that ,I hope things get better and the shots work! Thank you!!

question: Goodmorning Ladies!!Going to my docs apt since the last time that I found out I had a little bit of anemia but nurse said I could control it if I started taking the iron pills that same day, so wish me luck that it hasn't gone up!  & also wish me luck that the results from my gestational diabetes came out ok cus I'm really nervous about that one.thanks! Hope y'all have a good day! (:
title: gestational diabetes,& anemia
